article.description: Yettra Specks scored 21 points, including the go-ahead 3-pointer late in the second half, to lead Jackson State to its fourth-straight victory with a 65-61 win over Southern on Monday night.
article.headline: Jackson State edges Southern 65-61
article.story: JACKSON, Miss. -- Yettra Specks scored 21 points, including the go-ahead 3-pointer late in the second half, to lead Jackson State to its fourth-straight victory with a 65-61 win over Southern on Monday night. Edric Denis and Derek Roscoe added 14 points each for the Tigers (7-9, 3-0 Southwestern Athletic Conference), who shot 43 percent overall and held Southern to just six made field goals in the first half. Southern (6-11, 2-2) trailed by as much as nine early in the second half but kept chipping away, edging into its first lead since the game's opening bucket with JaMarcus Weatherspoon's fadeaway jumper to go up 61-60 with 36 second left. Specks then connected from the corner with his second 3 of the game to put the Tigers on top for good. Janarius Middleton clinched it with a pair of free throws. Weatherspoon finished with 16 points. Jared Sam and Chris Thomas added 13 points apiece for the Jaguars.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
